title: Happy Birthday, Eben!
content:
A [little bird](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201111931/http:/www.typophile.com/node/50961) told me it was Eben Sorkins’ birthday yesterday — so happy birthday, Eben!

 [‹ Happy Halloween (Monsters in Type)](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201111931/http:/www.typophile.com/node/51141 "Go to previous forum topic") [Requiem ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201111931/http:/www.typophile.com/node/51080 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Ricardo Cordoba

comments.content: Happy birthday!
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201111931im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/41_5529.jpg)

Happy B-day Eben!!!

ChrisL
Happy birthday, Eben!

Thanks very much!

As you can see my very talented classmates did great things despite my forgetting about it until 3pm in the afternoon.
Oh, who cares!
And a bag of chips!
Buon compleanno !
Happy birthday, Eben!
Happy belated birthday!
too late, too late ... nevertheless ... happy birthday!
happy belated! hope it was fab. :^D

Belated H B Eben. How are you enjoying English food? ;^)

Nick Cooke
Happy Birthday Eben!
Ok, happy late bday and happy next bday (in case I forget again!) lol.
Happy Birthday, Eben! Hope you broke out some delicious ale...
Happy Birthday- hope it was wondermous!

Happy birthday Eben. Hope it was a good one.

And that card rules!
Happy Birthday, Eben. Now get back to work. ;^) Serioiusly. Are you guys even working yet? :^P

Latest. _(So far. ;)_ But, still.

Happy Birthday, Eben.
Tiffany: [sure we are](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201111931/http:/cavedoni.com/reading/2008/10/unger-workshop.html)!
Happy Birthday + Long Live, Eben with Flowers

Belated, but you get the idea.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY EBEN!

Hope it was fun.

Take Care

PS. I love that card!

Andy
Bon anniversaire Eben!

Better late than never. Happy birthday Eben! That card they made for you is sweet. I hope all goes well for you at Reading.

j a m e s
Happy birthday, Eben!

Happy birthday Eben!  
Great to see what you are working on, Antonio. Very interesting also to see Unger’s approach to such a task, but I suppose there’s a really varied spectrum of experiences among those attending Reading… :=)

Bilated wishes, Eben!  
Hope it was a great day.

Happy Birthday Eben! Enjoy your day!

[megankirbydesign.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201111931/http:/www.megankirbydesign.com/)
A bit late. Happy birthday Eben!
Happy Belated!
even more belated, but Happy birthday!

Hope you had a good day, Eben. Here’s to many more!

Sharon
